content:
Sure, here are some interesting facts about these cleaning products:

* Toilet cleaner helps to remove dirt and stains from toilets and keep them hygienic.
* Thick bleach is a powerful disinfectant that can kill germs and bacteria on a variety of surfaces.
* Handy foaming washroom is a multi-purpose cleaner that can be used to clean washrooms and other areas of the home or office.
* Heavy duty degreaser is a powerful cleaning product that can remove stubborn stains and grease from surfaces.
* Hard surface cleaner is ideal for cleaning floors, walls, and other hard surfaces in kitchens and other areas.
* 10% washing up liquid is a highly effective dishwashing liquid that can help to cut through grease and grime.
* 20% concentrated lemon washing up liquid is a powerful dishwashing liquid that contains natural lemon extract to help break down tough stains and
